name: Football Drive
description:
Football Drive is simple to play, but tough to master!

Tap the screen to hit the moving targets and collect additional balls. Be quick but aim carefully before shooting. As soon as you’re out of balls - game over!

Features:
- Simple controls
- Addictive gameplay
- Short game sessions


How to play the game:
- Tap to shoot ball
- Catch balls to keep shooting
- Score goals and conquer the leaderboard

FYI! Football Drive is free to download and play, but, some game items can also be purchased for real money. If you don't want to use this feature, please disable in-app purchases in your device's settings. Also, under our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy, you must be at least 16 years of age to download or play Football Drive.

Privacy Policy: https://gbtigames.com/privacy-policy/

Terms of Service: https://gbtigames.com/terms-of-service/
